Package pl.bristleback.server.bristle.action.interceptor.matcher

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractAnnotationCheckingMatcher
    Base class for annotation checking interceptor matcher classes.
    AbstractPatternMatcher
    Basic class for all pattern action interceptor matcher classes.
    ActionClassNamePatternMatcher
    Checks if action should be intercepted using action class name.
    ActionClassPackagePatternMatcher
    Checks if action should be intercepted using action class package name.
    ActionNamePatternMatcher
    Checks if action should be intercepted using action class name.
    AnnotationCheckingActionClassMatcher
    This matcher checks whether given action class contains ALL required annotations.
    AnnotationCheckingActionMatcher
    This matcher checks whether given action contains ALL required annotations.
    CompositeInterceptorMatcher
    This is a convenient logical interceptor matcher, for general usage.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LogicalOperation
    Logical operations used in CompositeInterceptorMatcher class.
